text: WWF97 (sometimes referred to as Southern Oregon All Hazards) is a NOAA Weather Radio station that serves Southern Oregon and Northern California. It is programmed from the National Weather Service forecast office in Medford, Oregon with its transmitter located at Ashland atop Mount Ashland. It broadcasts weather and hazard information for the following counties in Oregon: Jackson, Josephine, and Klamath, and the following Northern California county of Siskiyou. ==References== µ Category:Ashland, Oregon
title: WWF97
